description: Assesses development of distinctive authorial voice

levels.4: Voice is unmistakably individual; could recognize this writer's work
levels.3: Voice has personality and some distinguishing characteristics
levels.2: Voice is present but generic; could be anyone
levels.1: No discernible voice; reads like flat summary

feedback_stems.strength: Your voice is distinctively yours—I could recognize it by
feedback_stems.growth: Push your voice further; what makes your perspective unique?

levels.4: Voice is consistent throughout; maintains personality even through shifts
levels.2: Voice wavers; sometimes present, sometimes disappears

feedback_stems.strength: Your voice remained strong throughout, even when
feedback_stems.growth: Maintain your voice consistently—don't let it disappear in action scenes or transitions

levels.4: Voice perfectly suits the content; enhances the story's effect
levels.3: Voice and content work together well

feedback_stems.strength: Your voice was perfect for this story because
feedback_stems.growth: Consider whether your voice serves this particular story

levels.4: Takes meaningful stylistic risks that pay off
levels.3: Some stylistic experimentation that mostly works
levels.2: Plays it safe; no real stylistic risks
levels.1: Either no risks or risks that don't work

feedback_stems.strength: I admired the stylistic risk you took when
feedback_stems.growth: Consider taking a stylistic risk—try something you haven't done before
